name: Get Real-time NFT Insights via Telegram with OpenSea & AI (Main Interface)
description:
Track NFT market trends, collections, and trades in real time‚Äîdirectly from Telegram! This master workflow integrates the OpenSea API, GPT-4o-mini AI, and Telegram, allowing users to request natural-language NFT analytics and receive structured insights instantly.

Whether you're an NFT trader, collector, or market analyst, this Telegram-native assistant brings you on-demand market intelligence‚Äîpowered by OpenSea and AI.

> ‚ö†Ô∏è Important: This workflow requires three sub-workflows to function properly. These must be downloaded and published in your n8n instance.

üß© Required Sub-Workflows  
To activate this template, download and publish the following workflows:

Analyze NFT Market Trends with AI-Powered OpenSea Analytics Agent Tool  
Get Real-time NFT Insights with OpenSea AI-Powered NFT Agent Tool  
Get Real-time NFT Marketplace Insights with OpenSea Marketplace Agent Tool  

üìå You can also find these by visiting my Creator profile:  
üëâ https://n8n.io/creators/don-the-gem-dealer/

How It Works  
A Telegram bot receives a message (e.g., ‚ÄúTop sales for Azuki‚Äù).  
The AI router in this workflow determines which agent should process the request:  
   Marketplace Agent ‚Üí Listings, offers, and orders  
   Analytics Agent ‚Üí Sales volume, price trends, wallet behavior  
   NFT Agent ‚Üí Metadata, traits, ownership info  
The selected agent queries the OpenSea API using your API key.  
The response is processed using GPT-4o-mini, formatted, and sent back via Telegram.

What You Can Do with This Agent  
üîπ Discover undervalued NFTs based on trait rarity and price  
üîπ Track market trends for any collection in real time  
üîπ Compare collection performance by volume, sales, and listings  
üîπ Analyze flipping trends and whale activity across wallets  
üîπ Retrieve NFT ownership and metadata instantly  
üîπ View trait-specific offers for insight into rarity-driven demand  

Example Queries You Can Use  
‚úÖ "What are the cheapest NFTs in the Pudgy Penguins collection?"  
‚úÖ "Get sales volume for Azuki and CloneX over the last 30 days."  
‚úÖ "Who owns Bored Ape #456?"  
‚úÖ "Show the best current offers for Moonbirds."  

Set Up Steps  
Create a Telegram Bot  
   Use @BotFather to create your bot and get the API token.  
Get an OpenSea API Key  
   Apply for your API key via the OpenSea Developer Portal.  
Configure n8n Credentials  
   Add your Telegram Bot and OpenSea API Key under Credentials in n8n.  
Download Required Sub-Workflows  
   Install and publish the following workflows:  
     Analytics Agent Tool  
     NFT Agent Tool  
     Marketplace Agent Tool  
Deploy & Test  
   Chat with your Telegram bot. Try: "Compare BAYC and Azuki volume" or "Show listings for Doodles."

‚úÖ Final Notes  
> If your queries don‚Äôt respond correctly, make sure all three sub-workflows are installed and published, not just saved.

üöÄ Dominate the NFT market with AI-powered OpenSea intelligence‚Äîright from your Telegram inbox!

user.name: Don Jayamaha Jr
user.bio: With 12 years of experience as a Blockchain Strategist and Web3 Architect, I specialize in bridging the gap between traditional industries and decentralized technologies. My expertise spans tokenized assets, crypto payment integrations, and blockchain-driven market solutions.
